alert.note: Alert for Cimarron; Texas (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 28 at 8:04PM CDT until May 28 at 8:45PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM CDT FOR WESTERN TEXAS...SOUTHEASTERN CIMARRON...WESTERN SHERMAN...DALLAM AND NORTHERN HARTLEY COUNTIES... At 804 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles west of Texhoma to 15 miles south of Boise City to 15 miles east of Amistad, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect some tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Dalhart, Stratford, Boise City, Hartley, Keyes, Eva, Ware, Conlen and Griggs. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
